name: jibsaramnim
text:
@roytang Apologies for the belated response! I had to check on my computer how I can send these your way.
One limitation I found is that BEL is not redeemable with a German Steam account, and Commandos 3 cannot be redeemed in any of these: AM, AR, AZ, BN, BO, BR, BS, BY, BZ, CC, CL, CN, CO, CR, CX, EC, GE, GF, GT, GY, HN, ID, IN, KG, KH, KZ, LA, MD, MM, MY, NI, PA, PE, PH, PY, RU, SG, SR, SV, TH, TJ, TM, TR, UA, UY, UZ, VE, VN
Can you let me know if this affects you? Please feel free to DM me! 😄
